TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Luhung, title = Luhung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhung} }

S.FORM: Luhung Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Luhung a niyaro', 248 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 749 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 80% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 597 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 20% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 152 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Lohong Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Lohong a niyaro', 248 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 749 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 80% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 597 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 20% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 152 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
